item.title: About the author
item.description: Hello world! My name is Vladimir, an Engineering Manager, Software Engineer, and a slow and lazy writer. I have Master degree in Computer Science and background in Content Management Systems, Web Development Agencies, and Product Engineering from small start-ups to large global scale-ups. Interests Currently I write mostly about: Managing Software Engineering teams Architecture and Systems Design Coaching and productivity You can find some of my older posts on this site about:
